prompt_inputs.goal: Marathon training - high-endurance athlete requiring 3000+ calories with carbohydrate loading and strategic hydration timing

solution_criteria: Meal plan totals 3000+ calories with carbohydrate-focused macronutrient distribution (55-65% carbs)
Includes hydration timing recommendations aligned with training/recovery phases
Provides 6 or fewer eating occasions for practical single-day implementation
task_description: Write a compact, concise 1 day meal plan for a single athlete
scenario: Testing with a high-endurance athlete (marathon runner) requiring 3000+ calories with emphasis on carbohydrate loading and hydration timing

prompt_inputs.goal: Build muscle and strength for weightlifting competition

solution_criteria: Meal plan covers exactly one full day with 4-5 meals
Includes pre- and post-training meals with appropriate timing
Protein intake meets or exceeds 1.6-2.2g per kg of body weight
Meals are compact and practical (no lengthy preparation descriptions)
task_description: Write a compact, concise 1 day meal plan for a single athlete
scenario: Testing with a strength/power athlete (weightlifter) requiring protein-focused nutrition with specific meal timing around training sessions

prompt_inputs.goal: Professional soccer player preparing for a match day - maximize energy, maintain agility, and support quick recovery

solution_criteria: Meal plan covers all meals from breakfast through dinner with a pre-game meal timing consideration
Total daily caloric intake aligns with moderate-to-high athletic needs for a 78kg soccer player
Includes carbohydrate-rich foods for sustained energy and quick glucose availability
Pre-game meal is light and easily digestible, scheduled 2-3 hours before match time
task_description: Write a compact, concise 1 day meal plan for a single athlete
scenario: Testing with a sport-specific scenario (professional soccer player) balancing moderate-to-high caloric needs with agility and quick energy requirements, including pre-game meal considerations
